item.title: How To Manage Multiple Versions of Python on a Mac
item.description: Summary Warnings Mac OS needs python Other projects may need specific versions of python Installation python.org Homebrew Anaconda PATH and .bash_profile PATH .bash_profile Homebrew - pyenv Pyenv Local Pyenv Global Locate Python Uninstall python python.org Homebrew Troubleshooting Uninstall Python from Pyenv Anaconda Additional Resources XKCD Summary Itâ€™s easy to install multiple versions of python on a Mac computer using installers from python.
